casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jose Felix SANTIAGO CARRILLO. No. 267P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. Richard L. Harrison, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of May 2004 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
